name: part_000
file: tmp_大神ミオ５周年記念ライブ『ナイトループ』【 ホロライブ ⧸ 大神ミオ 】 [YqPVwYLcvrY]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: Opening title card and stylized intro animation featuring clocks and Mio's silhouette.
Introduction monologue. Mio walks in a dark void, reflecting on the past five years.
Performance of the song 'Yakou Tsuushin'. Mio sings on a rooftop stage against a nighttime cityscape background.

subtitles.original:
ナイトループ
Mio 5th Anniversary Live
subtitles.english:
Night Loop
Mio 5th Anniversary Live

subtitles.original:
まもなく、大神ミオ5周年記念ライブ
『ナイトループ』スタートします。
subtitles.english:
Coming soon, Ookami Mio's 5th Anniversary Live
'Night Loop' will begin.

subtitles.original:
ライブのコンセプトはアルバムのテーマと同じ、
夜です。
subtitles.english:
The concept of this live is the same as
the album's theme: night.

subtitles.original: ぜひ最後までごゆっくりお楽しみください。
subtitles.english: Please relax and enjoy until the very end.
Five years since 2018...

subtitles.original: 通り過ぎてきた、たくさんの夜。
subtitles.english: So many nights have passed by.

subtitles.original: 長かったような、短かったような。
subtitles.english: They felt long, yet short at the same time.

subtitles.original: 何度でも繰り返したいような...
subtitles.english: Like something I'd want to repeat over and over...

subtitles.original: 繰り返したい。
subtitles.english: I want to repeat them.

subtitles.original: 君はこのループから抜け出したいの？
subtitles.english: Do you want to escape from this loop?

subtitles.original: 聴こえますか？
subtitles.english: Can you hear me?

subtitles.original: 聴こえますか？
subtitles.english: Can you hear me?

subtitles.original: 夜光通信
subtitles.english: Night Light Communication

subtitles.original: ハロー ハロー 聴こえますか
subtitles.english: Hello, hello, can you hear me?

subtitles.original: そっちは何年？
subtitles.english: What year is it over there?

subtitles.original: 正しく分かち合う手段は
subtitles.english: The ways to truly share ourselves...

subtitles.original: 一つじゃないさ
subtitles.english: ...aren't just one.

subtitles.original: 漂う時間は何処へ行くのか
subtitles.english: Where does this drifting time go?

subtitles.original: さよならはいつ誰が決めるの？
subtitles.english: When and who decides our goodbyes?

subtitles.original: その手に触れようと願ってる
subtitles.english: I'm wishing to touch those hands.

subtitles.original: 本当さ
subtitles.english: It's true.

subtitles.original: 永遠の夜光 君に歌う
subtitles.english: Eternal night light, I sing for you.

subtitles.original: 世界中が君にいじわるでも
subtitles.english: Even if the whole world is mean to you,

subtitles.original: 思い出して
subtitles.english: Remember this,

subtitles.original: 覚えていて
subtitles.english: keep it in mind.

subtitles.original: 瞼の裏 ずっとまた会えるからね
subtitles.english: Behind your eyelids, we can always meet again.

subtitles.original: 穏やかに
subtitles.english: Peacefully,

subtitles.original: 健やかに
subtitles.english: healthily.

subtitles.original: 流れ続け 君だって私だって
subtitles.english: Continuing to flow, both you and I...

subtitles.original: 消えるのは 言葉だけ
subtitles.english: ...the only things that disappear are words.

subtitles.original: ふんわり君を抱きしめてあげるからね
subtitles.english: I'll gently hold you close.

subtitles.original: 泣かないで
subtitles.english: Don't cry.

subtitles.original: 延々と続く今日は
subtitles.english: This today that goes on forever

subtitles.original: 雪原のようで
subtitles.english: is like a snowy field.

subtitles.original: 当然の幸せすら
subtitles.english: Even natural happiness...
